mapper.select:
SELECT big.id, big.targetMonth, big.rate, big.time, big.amount, big.account, big.partner subsidyType, sum(logtwo.amount) monthReceive FROM ( SELECT log.record_id id, date_format( log.target_year_month, '%Y-%m' ) targetMonth, log.target_year_month targetTime, mission.subsidy_percent rate, mission.create_at missionTime, mission.partner, date_format( log.create_at, '%Y-%m-%d' ) time, log.amount amount, log.info_id info, userTable.user_account account FROM czb_income_log log LEFT JOIN czb_user_income_info income ON log.info_id = income.info_id LEFT JOIN czb_user userTable ON income.user_id = userTable.user_id LEFT JOIN czb_subsidy_mission mission ON mission.mission_id = log.souse_id WHERE log.remark = '补贴' ) big LEFT JOIN czb_income_log logtwo ON logtwo.info_id = big.info and unix_timestamp( logtwo.create_at ) < unix_timestamp( big.missionTime ) WHERE DATE_FORMAT(logtwo.create_at, '%Y%m') = DATE_FORMAT(big.targetTime, '%Y%m')
AND big.account like concat("%", #{account}, "%")
AND DATE_FORMAT(#{subsidyMonth}, '%Y%m') = DATE_FORMAT(big.targetTime, '%Y%m')
AND DATE_FORMAT(#{subsidyTime}, '%Y%m%d') = DATE_FORMAT(big.time, '%Y%m%d')
GROUP BY id
mapper.insert:
insert into czb_income_log ( record_id, amount, type, info_id, before_change_income, remark, souse_id, target_year_month, create_at, update_at ) values
( #{item.recordId}, #{item.amount}, #{item.type}, #{item.infoId}, #{item.beforeMoney}, '补贴', #{item.sourceId}, #{item.targetMonth}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP )
mapper.update: update czb_subsidy_mission set state = 1 where mission_id = #{missionId}
mapper.select: SELECT info.info_id infoId, ( info.fanyong_income + info.share_income + info.got_total_rent + info.other_income ) beforeMoney, date_format(mission.target_year_month,'%Y-%m-%d') targetMonth, subUser.mission_id sourceId, subUser.amount FROM czb_user_income_info info LEFT JOIN czb_subsidy_user subUser ON subUser.user_id = info.user_id LEFT JOIN czb_subsidy_mission mission ON mission.mission_id = #{missionId} WHERE subUser.mission_id = #{missionId} and mission.state = 0
mapper.insert: insert INTO czb_subsidy_mission ( mission_id, target_year_month, subsidy_percent, state, partner, money_type, create_at, update_at ) VALUES ( #{missionId}, #{subsidyMonth}, #{subsidyRate}, 0, #{subsidyType}, #{moneyType}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP , CURRENT_TIMESTAMP )
